description: Detects an executable in the users directory started from Microsoft Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Publisher or Visio
name: MS Office Product Spawning Exe in User Dir
query: ((process.parent.executable:(*\\WINWORD.EXE OR *\\EXCEL.EXE OR *\\POWERPNT.exe OR *\\MSPUB.exe OR *\\VISIO.exe) AND process.executable:C\:\\users\\* AND process.executable:*.exe) AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\Teams.exe)))
author: Jason Lynch
